issue.title: [Java] Remove deprecated methods from Java dataset module in Arrow 11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17797](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17797). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-15745 deprecated some things in the Dataset module which should be removed for Arrow >= 11
